response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, I understand it could be worth $15,000 to you. However, considering the current market conditions and my inventory management, I am offering this remarkable opportunity to you at a special price of $12,000. This represents a significant savings for you while ensuring a fair transaction for me. I look forward to your positive response and the chance to serve you with our premium product.", "product_price": 12000}
